The Wi-Fi LED blinks fast for about 3 mi: The Wi-Fi LED blinks fast for about 3 minutes.
After firmware is flashed, the board reb: After firmware is flashed, the board reboots and the Wi-Fi LED turns on solid for 30 seconds and then turns off.
